document.full_text: police fired water cannons and tear gas into crowds in manzini, the nation's largest city, on tuesday, squelching a long-planned rally in the last absolute monarchy in africa.
document.title: police officers in swaziland squash rally for democracy
lines_and_colors: police fired water cannons and tear gas into crowds in manzini, the nation's largest city, on tuesday, squelching a long-planned rally in the last absolute monarchy in africa.
